title: Sexist
body:
So like my girlfriend was playing league couple of days ago and she ran into a pantheon teammate, game started and blitz invaded and pulled her wich is normal happens to all of us and something usual therefore the pantheon was like ( you're a chick arent you, stupid chicks playing games they should gtfo etc and being sexist) im not sure if this guy trying to be cool or trying to get attention so he can look tough or something but yeah and the funny thing is he was lower rank than my GF. Thats his name 
( _Name Removed_ )

replies.body: So you pretty much made this thread to tell people you have a girlfriend ?

> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=nA8EQ0Yy,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-30T00:21:31.912+0000)
>
> So you pretty much made this thread to tell people you have a girlfriend ?

Lmao from your response i can pretty much tell that you are the same kind of people as him and no i didnt make this thread to tell people i have a girlfriend, im just sharing my thoughts

> [{quoted}](name=1 Million KhaZix,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=nA8EQ0Yy,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-09-30T00:29:57.141+0000)
>
> Lmao from your response i can pretty much tell that you are the same kind of people as him and no i didnt make this thread to tell people i have a girlfriend, im just sharing my thoughts

So from me belittling your garbage thread somehow deems me a sexist bigot ? Jog on mate
Why don't we just say the pantheon was a jerk and lets not be jerks to each other!
Was the Pantheon by any chance called Hugh Mungus?
Just to inform you aren't allowed to "name and shame" people, your post may or may not be deleted due to this. Just a warning.

> [{quoted}](name=ShuffledPancake,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=nA8EQ0Yy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-30T00:18:43.832+0000)
>
> Just to inform you aren't allowed to "name and shame" people, your post may or may not be deleted due to this. Just a warning.

Yes im aware of that indeed but some haters should just learn how to take games as a game and not some sort of turnoment etc
